short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimize, resize, and manage your Webflow Designer extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Webflow Extension Minimizer is a handy Chrome extension that adds an intuitive set of controls to the Webflow Designer’s built-in extension panel. Now you can quickly minimize the panel to free up screen space and maximize it again when you need. Plus, choose from preset size options (Large, Comfortable, or Default) to immediately scale the extension window, making your Webflow workflow smoother and more organized.

Key Features:
-----
Minimize/Maximize: One-click button to hide the Webflow extension window, then restore it with a floating “Maximize” bubble.

Preset Sizes: Choose from three custom window sizes:
Large (800×600) for comfortable full-panel editing
Comfortable (320×460) for mid-level tasks
Default (240×460) to keep the panel small and out of the way

Active Button Highlight: Know at a glance which size preset is currently applied.

User-Friendly: Simple design integrated directly into the extension header—no complicated setup required.

How It Works
----
Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open your Webflow project’s Designer (e.g., yoursite.design.webflow.com).
You’ll notice new buttons at the top of the extension panel:

Size Controls (Large, Comfortable, Default) to instantly scale the extension window.
A Minimize button (“-”) to hide the panel.

A floating bubble that appears in the bottom-right corner when minimized—click it to restore.
Switch sizes anytime. The currently selected size button is highlighted, so you always know your panel dimension.

Why You’ll Love It:
----
Saves Screen Space: Toggle the extension panel off when you need more room to focus on the Designer canvas.

Instant Window Resizing: Quickly jump between preferred sizes without manually dragging or resizing.

Easy to Use: Intuitive, minimal interface—just click and go.

Permissions & Privacy
We only request permission for *://*.design.webflow.com/* so we can inject the helpful controls into your Webflow Designer.

No personal data is collected or stored; all interactions happen directly within your browser.

Support
---
Need help or have feedback? Reach out at [Your Support URL or Contact Email].
Check our [GitHub repository] or website for documentation and code.
